page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN TODDINGTON
page.content: This area has good access for travel. The area of{employment}is from 1-50 miles. The largest local employer is the Motorway Service Station employing 319 people, 110 coming from the area. 3 schools employ over 80 people. Shops, offices and licensed premises around the Green offer 120 full time and 112 part time jobs. Small{local industries}include beetroot and egg packing, dairy products, iron craft, fencing, farm machinery, farm work and transport and a garden centre. On a survey using 500 families, 97{travel}daily to London and 446 travel by car. At least 250 people work in Luton and Dunstable. { {Unemployment} There is little visible unemployment. At the present time the unemployment rate for this area is about 6%.
